CustomField.formula: 65 - (if(And(Month(Today())>= month(PersonBirthdate), Day(Today()) >= Day(PersonBirthdate)), Year(Today())- Year(PersonBirthdate) + (Month(Today())-Month(PersonBirthdate))/12, if(And(month(Today())< month(PersonBirthdate), Day(Today())>= Day(PersonBirthdate)), Year(Today())-Year(PersonBirthdate)-1 + (12 - Month(PersonBirthdate)+month(Today()))/12, if(And( month(Today())< month(PersonBirthdate), Day(Today())< Day(PersonBirthdate)), (Year(Today())-Year(PersonBirthdate)-1) + ((12 - Month(PersonBirthdate)+month(Today())-1))/12, if(And( month(Today())= month(PersonBirthdate), Day(Today())< Day(PersonBirthdate)), (Year(Today())- Year(PersonBirthdate)-1) + (11/12), (Year(Today())- Year(PersonBirthdate)) + (Month(Today())-Month(PersonBirthdate)-1)/12)))))
CustomField.label: Years to Retirement
